mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_member (team_id, student_id, role, join_time, status) VALUES (#{teamId}, #{studentId}, #{role}, #{joinTime}, #{status})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM team_member WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.select: SELECT tm.*, u.name as student_name, u.avatar as avatar, t.team_name as team_name FROM team_member tm LEFT JOIN user u ON tm.student_id = u.id LEFT JOIN team t ON tm.team_id = t.id WHERE tm.id = #{id}
